metadata.title: CVE-2018-16838 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in sssd Group Policy Objects implementation. When the GPO is not readable by SSSD due to a too strict permission settings on the server side, SSSD will allow all authenticated users to login instead of denying access.

criterions.comment: sssd package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.2-1').
